video_prompt: Koi gracefully swim, fins undulating, through rippling turquoise water. Lily pads subtly shift, and water lilies gently sway. Sunlight glints off the moving surface, creating dynamic speckles.
image_prompt: A vibrant, vertical photo of two stylized 3D koi fish (orange Showa Sanke and white Kohaku) with distinct scales and fins, swimming in a clear turquoise pond towards the bottom right. The water features light blue and white ripples and light speckles. Several green lily pads with two blooming pink water lilies float on the surface. The scene evokes serenity and beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Koi continuously swim, their fins undulating, navigating through the perpetually rippling water. Lily pads subtly drift and water lilies gently sway. Sunlight dynamically glints, constantly shifting across the moving surface, producing an ever-changing pattern of sparkling speckles.
